availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, laborer. Native of Ireland. Son of Pierce Rochford and Anna F. Rochford. Day laborer in Kenton County, Kentucky, in 1860. Resident of Pendleton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, West Covington, p. 329.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, District 1, p. 392B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, Enumeration District 158, p. 335D.
